content.question: Which of the following best supports the endosymbiotic theory?

choices.label: Mitochondria and chloroplasts have their own genomes.
Enzymes used in photosynthesis differ from those in cellular respiration in all eukaryotes.
Bacteria and plants both have cell walls.
Bacterial flagella are structurally different from eukaryotic flagella.

content.answer: Mitochondria and chloroplasts have their own genomes.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
